title: Magnetic field at center of four parallel wires

content.question: Four long, straight wires are arranged at the vertices of a square with sides of length 2a, as shown in the figure above. Each wire carries a current I. The currents of three of the wires are directed into the page, while the current at point C is directed out of the page. What is the magnetic field at the center of the square?
